thread.title: ZeroStack to Sponsor, Present and Exhibit at OpenStack Summit Tokyo 2015
thread.title_full: ZeroStack to Sponsor, Present and Exhibit at OpenStack Summit Tokyo 2015

author: admin
title: ZeroStack to Sponsor, Present and Exhibit at OpenStack Summit Tokyo 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 6:02 AM Companies mentioned in this article: ZeroStack, Inc. 
MOUNTAIN VIEW, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/21/15 -- ZeroStack Inc. , a pioneer in self-service and scale-out private cloud, today announced its presence at OpenStack Summit Tokyo, taking place Oct. 26-29, 2015. The company, a startup sponsor, will exhibit, demo the recently launched ZeroStack Cloud Platform and present two sessions at the show. 
OpenStack is a global collaboration of developers and cloud computing technologists producing the open source cloud computing platform for public and private clouds. ZeroStack is a supporting organization and an active member of the OpenStack community. 
Sponsor Demo and Session Details-at-a-Glance 
What: ZeroStack Cloud Platform demo When: Tuesday Oct. 27, 2015, 11:50 a.m. - 12:10 p.m. JST Where: Expo Hall (Marketplace Theater) 
What: Presentation titled, "Reliable OpenStack - Designing for Availability and Enterprise Readiness" When: Tuesday Oct. 27, 2015, 4:40 p.m. - 5:20 p.m. JST Presenters: Ajay Gulati, CEO and co-founder, ZeroStack Inc. Chaitanya Bvk, Software Engineer, ZeroStack Inc. 
Where: Wakaba 
What: Presentation titled, "Tapping into OpenStack's Notification System" When: Wednesday Oct. 28, 2015, 11:15 - 11:55 a.m. JST Presenters: Deep Bhattacharjee, Head of Product Management, ZeroStack Inc. Sunil Arora, Software Engineer, ZeroStack Inc. Ravikant Malpani, Software Engineer, ZeroStack Inc. 
Where: Hakugyoku 
The ZeroStack Cloud Platform couples on-premise, hyper-converged infrastructure with a web portal handling management and operations with complete health monitoring and predictive analytics. ZeroStack was founded on the premise that building and operating a private cloud should be fast, simple and cost-effective without sacrificing functionality. The ZeroStack Cloud Platform provides the ability to build a cloud in minutes with no prior experience necessary; universal view and governance of cloud services across sites, business units and projects; full control of sensitive data with a self-healing architecture hosted on-site; and curated updates through automated patching and upgrades. 
To learn more about the technology, go to: https://www.zerostack.com/product/ 
Connect with ZeroStack at OpenStack Summit Tokyo To schedule a private meeting with a ZeroStack executive at the show, contact zerostack@kulesafaul.com . Follow the company on Twitter at https://twitter.com/ZeroStackInc . 
For more information on OpenStack Summit Tokyo and to register, visit: https://www.openstack.org/summit/tokyo-2015/ . 
Tweet This: Headed to @OpenStack Summit Tokyo? Attend a @ZeroStackInc session or see a demo at Booth T43. More info: http://bit.ly/1ZV51sG 
About ZeroStack ZeroStack delivers the industry's first complete, scale-out private cloud that converges compute, storage, networking and management services. With ZeroStack, customers can drastically reduce time to value for IT, and lower software, hardware and operational costs. Founded by Kiran Bondalapati, founding engineer at Bromium, and Ajay Gulati, who was senior architect and R&D lead at VMware, ZeroStack was built by a veteran team of cloud experts. The company is headquartered in Mountain View, CA and funded by investors including Formation 8 and Foundation Capital. For more information, visit www.zerostack.com or follow @ZeroStackInc . Contact:
